<<<<<<< HEAD
A demonstration of family-duties: or Certaine propositions and reasons of them taken [ou]t of the holy Scriptures, tending to shew the necessity, nature, and manner of performance of such religious duties, as Christian families ought to spare some time unto from common affaires every day. By T.P. Paget, Thomas, d. 1660.
[22], 143, [1] p.
M DC XLIII. Printed by H.A. for Thomas Vnderhill, dwelling at the signe of the Bible, in Woodstreet, London, [London] : [1643]
T. P. = Thomas Paget. With marginal notes. Imperfect; tightly bound with some loss of text. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
=======
